entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
